page.title: 08HOUSING
page.content: {HOUSING} Around us stand rows of farm cottages in the midst of fields,or around the main farm house.They are built of local stone and most of them have pantiled roofs.A few of the cottages are derelict or even unoccupied but mainly they are occupied by farm workers or rented by people. During our survey we found out that the majority of houses are owner occupied apart from the farm cottages. There are just 24 council houses in this area,but there is a long term plan for to build more council houses in{Stenton}. Just about all the houses in{Stenton} and{Whittingehame}are built with local red stone and have pantiled roofs.The council houses are 50 years old and blend in well. { }
